document.full_text: italy's ruling center-right coalition was resoundingly beaten in run-off administrative elections on monday, a defeat that further weakens prime minister silvio berlusconi.
document.title: europe: more blows to berlusconi coalition
lines_and_colors: italy's ruling center-right coalition was resoundingly beaten in run-off administrative elections on monday, a defeat that further weakens prime minister silvio berlusconi.
